summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4532 for the improvement of Mary Avenue Northwest, and 13th Avenue Northwest, each from West 75th Street to West 85th Street concrete sidewalks, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
